description:
The Bright Jewel that shines in the night sky of Skyland suddenly goes dark. Sora and the gang travel to Floating Island where it is located to try to find the cause.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oozora o Sukue! Ukishima no Himitsu
Save the Sky! The Secret of Floating Island
大空を救え! 浮き島のひみつ
